snippet: A teaser trailer for the project, featuring Jerry Seinfeld and several of his well-known pals (including Larry David, Ricky Gervais, Colin Quinn and Alec Baldwin) quietly appeared Thursday on the Web.
abstract: A teaser trailer for the project, featuring Jerry Seinfeld and several of his well-known pals (including Larry David, Ricky Gervais, Colin Quinn and Alec Baldwin) quietly appeared Thursday on the Web.

headline.main: What's the Deal With Jerry Seinfeld's 'Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee'?
